alert.note: Alert for Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 4:26PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pima County through 515 PM MST... At 425 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Redington, or 19 miles southeast of Oracle, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Redington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson
